categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kantis was a female Rattataki Major of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War she was stationed on the Vaiken Spacedock. During the Dread War, she was stationed in the Dread Executioners camp on the moon Oricon as part of the Dread Executioners. During the Revanite crisis, she was moved to Yavin 4 to assist the Yavin Coalition.
Major Kantis appears Star Wars: The Old Republic as a gear vendor on the Imperial Fleet, Oricon and Yavin 4.
